mapper.select: select p.id as post_id, p.title as post_title, pc.id as comment_id, 'PICK' as comment_type, pc.contents as comment_contents, pc.created_at as comment_created_at, po.title as pick_option_title, po.pick_option_type as pick_option_type from pick_comment pc left join pick_vote pv on pv.id = pc.pick_vote_id left join pick_option po on po.id = pv.pick_option_id inner join pick p on p.id = pc.pick_id where pc.created_by = #{memberId} and pc.deleted_at is null and pc.id < #{pickCommentId} union select t.id as post_id, t.title as post_title, tc.id as comment_id, 'TECH_ARTICLE' as comment_type, tc.contents as comment_contents, tc.created_at as comment_created_at, null as pick_option_title, null as pick_option_type from tech_comment tc inner join tech_article t on t.id = tc.tech_article_id where tc.created_by = #{memberId} and tc.deleted_at is null and tc.id < #{techCommentId} order by comment_created_at desc limit #{limit};
